weather.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {table} WHERE time BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-01-02'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {table} WHERE time BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-02-01'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {table} WHERE time BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01'
SELECT date_trunc('day', time) AS day, AVG(temperature) FROM {table} WHERE time >= '2020-01-01' AND time < '2020-02-01' GROUP BY day ORDER BY day
SELECT time_bucket('1 day', time) AS day, AVG(temperature) FROM {table} WHERE time >= '2020-01-01' AND time < '2020-02-01' GROUP BY day ORDER BY day
SELECT AVG(temperature) FROM {table} WHERE relative_humidity > 80 AND time BETWEEN '2020-06-01' AND '2020-06-30'
SELECT AVG(temperature) FROM {table} WHERE relative_humidity > 85 AND time BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-01-31'
